experience: You and Beverly Keyes both know Jordan Grenier, Barbara  J. Stepp, and 6 others

Successfully created hypnosis company with staff (rare in the industry of hypnotherapy). Became known in the industry within only a few years, with international media exposure on radio and TV. Created own methodology and brand. Planned, created & managed growth of corporate website. Migrated services to creating digital marketing for small businesses. Created web architecture, site map and became web developer for multiple sites using WordPress. Created Internet Marketing business web architecture and programming of numerous squeeze pages, sales pages and email marketing with Infusionsoft, Constant Contact and AWeber. Planned and implemented multiple e-commerce stores. Documented all procedures. Created multiple videos using Video Builder, Explaindio, PowerPoint and EasyVSL.

summary: Are you struggling to find customer or clients? Do you need marketing done for you?  Websites, Videos, SEO and Marketing Services. Get free ebook at http://www.holistichubmarketing.com Gender Brain Chemistry™-get free ebook http://www.CustomerChemistry4Success.comYou can get your answers here! Discover how!Beverly Taylor is a Gender Brain Chemistry Master. She is the Founder and CEO of the Easy Key to Life (™) and the Holistic Hub, is an award winning author, speaker, neuromarketer, life and wellness coach, teacher and certified hypnotherapist. She endeavors to help improve our world around us. She is the founder of the Easy Key to Life method, which is a simple, yet profound, way of clearing out emotional pain to access one’s true love, happiness and wisdom.Beverly is the author of the first-of-its-kind program and books, "Clutter to Clarity™: The Easy Key to Organizing" and "Clutter to Clarity™ for Hypnotherapists: Using Hypnotherapy to Help People Gently Clear Clutter", "Brain Chemistry for Practitioners" book, the "Easy Key to Life Hypnotherapy Program" book, multiple guided meditation CDs and numerous courses. Beverly Taylor has been a guest on TV, such as ABC Channel 7 "The View from the Bay". She was the featured hypnotherapist in the TLC (The Learning Channel) TV show "Help! I'm a Hoarder". Beverly is the host of the internet radio show "Easy Key to Life Radio Show". She has been on and hosted radio shows, such as "Seeing Beyond", "In the Company of Angels", “The Frankie Boyer show”, "The Chuck and Don Show", and the internet shows “Intuitive Eyes", "Advanced Living with Ken Lesser", and "Walking with Spirit with Monique Chapman".Specialties: Beverly is certified in Advanced Hypnotherapy, Medical Hypnotherapy, Pain Management Hypnotherapy, HypnoCoaching, Transformational Healing Method, Sports Enhancement Hypnotherapy, Past Life Regression and LuxMani Energywork and holds a multiple subject Bilingual Teaching Credential and BA from UCLA.
